info.title: Protocol J
info.subtitle: TCP/IP Protocol for controlling endpoint routers

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: Messages to the Protocol J routing service are by means of a TCP SOCK_STREAM connection to TCP port 9600 on the host server.
